name: babel-plugin-transform-diffhtml
description: Compiles tagged templates into createTree calls

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-cjs && npm run build-esm
scripts.build-cjs: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules NODE_ENV=cjs babel lib -d dist/cjs && sh ../../post-cjs.sh
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=umd watchify --im -s transform -g babelify lib/index.js -o dist/index.js -v
scripts.build-fixtures: npm run build-normal-fixtures && npm run build-wasm-fixtures
scripts.build-normal-fixtures: NODE_ENV=normal NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules babel --ignore node_modules test/fixtures.js -o test/.__fixtures_normal__.js
scripts.build-wasm-fixtures: NODE_ENV=wasm NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-wasm-modules babel --ignore node_modules test/fixtures.js -o test/.__fixtures_wasm__.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run build-fixtures && mocha test/assertions --experimental-wasm-modules

author: Tim Branyen (@tbranyen)
